fields.title: The Falling One
fields.description: fantastic for the ones who loves that things are climbing them!

fields.title: The lighting one
fields.description: this one is great for those who love to sit in the light rather then the dark!

fields.title: The Color one
fields.description: nothing funny about this one, it is actually a nice one with color and everything!

fields.title: The Blocking One
fields.description: this one is for those who love planet that are blocking the stairs!

fields.title: The Giant white one
fields.description: this one is actually grown on extreme contidions, on the snow from Mount Hermon, so it got some amazing white colors!

fields.title: The Jungle Ones
fields.description: this ones will give your garden a sense of jungle. it comes with extra bag of flies and bugs!

fields.title: The Giant white one
fields.description: this one is actually grown on extreme contidions, on the snow from Mount Hermon, so it got some amazing white colors. but it was there only 3 hourse so it is not so white as the giant one, you should get the giant one..

fields.title: My One
fields.description: this one is raised by me on my apertment.One day I saw that she was starting to grow leaves So I put it in a water, this one is special to me, this is why it a bit expensive.
